item.title: University Ranking Frontend Deep Dive (Part 2): State Management, React Query, and Theme Architecture
item.description: Part 2 of our deep dive into the University Ranking Frontend. We explore ThemeContext implementation, LanguageContext, RankingsProvider with React Query, and platform-specific optimizations.
